data.event: By the late 1960s, Dera was provided with electricity from a dam on the Awash River.
In October 1969, Emperor Haile Selassie inaugurated a water supply system for the town built at a cost of Birr 170,000.

event.title: was completed and opened for traffic 15 August 2009

data.event: Construction on the 99 kilometer road between Chole and Dera was completed and opened for traffic 15 August 2009, at a cost of over 146 million Birr.
